p: All statistical analyses were carried out in R version 3.4.0. GLMMs were built using the package "lme4" [ 48] using a binomial distribution, logit link and bobyqa optimizer. We also calculated coefficients of determination in the form of marginal R 2, the variance explained by the fixed effects only, and conditional R 2, variance explained by fixed and random effects combined [ 49], for all GLMMs using the rsquared function in the package "piecewiseSEM" [ 50].
